title: Propulsion Configuration Tutorial T-thruster section is confusing

content.raw:
In the "T" section of the Propulsion Configuration Tutorial we say:

"To add a single lateral thruster requires the following changes:

* Define new URDF/xacro definition of the WAM-V #!/osrf/vmrc/src/default/wamv_gazebo/urdf/wamv_gazebo_t.urdf.xacro This description includes a new thruster layout:

1. A thruster layout definition that includes both the visual and thruster plugin parameters #!/osrf/vmrc/src/default/wamv_gazebo/urdf/thruster_layouts/wamv_t_thrusters.xacro

It could be just the bullet/number mix, but this explanation lost me. What do we mean by "define new URDF/xacro definition of the WAM-V"?
content.html:
In the "T" section of the Propulsion Configuration Tutorial we say:

"To add a single lateral thruster requires the following changes:

  • Define new URDF/xacro definition of the WAM-V #!/osrf/vmrc/src/default/wamv_gazebo/urdf/wamv_gazebo_t.urdf.xacro This description includes a new thruster layout:
  1. A thruster layout definition that includes both the visual and thruster plugin parameters #!/osrf/vmrc/src/default/wamv_gazebo/urdf/thruster_layouts/wamv_t_thrusters.xacro

It could be just the bullet/number mix, but this explanation lost me. What do we mean by "define new URDF/xacro definition of the WAM-V"?
